I own two computers, and I bought KSP on one of them. However, I would like it on both computers. Do I have to buy it again? I can't seem to find a suitable download link for it.

Thanks,

Lkemccarthy

Hi lkemccarthy, welcome to the community

You bought the rights to play KSP, so you can install it on more than one computer, you are just asked not to share KSP with friends, there is the Demo for that.

You can download KSP by following these instructions.
